author: The Canadian Press
title: People making up to $1,000 a month will be able to qualify for CERB in new changes to program
description: People whose EI benefits have run out and seasonal workers will also be able to access aid
content:
OTTAWA — The federal government is making changes to its COVID-19 programs to send emergency aid to seasonal workers without jobs and those whose hours have been drastically cut but who still have some income.
The changes will also allow people who are makin… [+3558 chars]
